name: xoink
short_description: Xoink is a lightweight 2D ui interface animation lib for embedded devices, skins, game ui. Xoink can play bitmap only Flash 3 SWF files or convert them to its own binary or XML formats. Xoink is small, fast, exploits device blitters, and is easy to port.
